channel.title: What are some ways to advertise my server? & How to expand my server population?
channel.description: I am just starting to make my own server after deciding to quit Runescape, so I need some info about advertising my server, and getting more players to it. I know how to code a server as I'm fairly good with the basics of Java. I just need ideas on how I would expand my servers population & advertising it now now :|...

item.title: What are some ways to advertise my server? & How to expand my server population?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Ii Claw iI, post:4, topic:303887”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=400157.msg2967731#msg2967731 date=1253731657]
www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php & tutorials section
[/quote] Tutorials section for advertising servers? Are you stupid?=)
Only at server status page.[/quote]No, you can learn stuff from the tutorials section and advertise at the status page… wow…

Read full topic
item.source: What are some ways to advertise my server? & How to expand my server population?
